com.olliebown.beads.analysis  
com.olliebown.beads.analysis.featureextractors Provides a set of analysis classes for analysing a stream of audio frames.
com.olliebown.beads.analysis.segmenters  
com.olliebown.beads.core Provides Beads' core classes, in particular, Bead, UGen and AudioContext.
com.olliebown.beads.data Provides classes for handling buffers of data, including samples and common waveforms and windows.
com.olliebown.beads.data.buffers  
com.olliebown.beads.events Provides classes for handling events.
com.olliebown.beads.ugens Provides a set of Unit Generators, which are classes that perform some sort of audio rate process.
